controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Creates view and model, handles events from the keyboard and implements actions from subcontrollers
    Version:
    2016-02-28
    Author:
    Ingrid, Micaela

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainController(View view)
      Constructor that adds a reference to the view, configures the view and adds subcontrollers and starts the startup menu

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Handles events coming from the ESC button on the keyboard, and from when the main window is closed
      void exit()
      Exits the game
      void exitMenu()
      Exits the game from the ingame menu or gameover menu and shows the startup menu
      void loadGame()
      Loads a game
      void pauseGame()
      Pauses a running game and shows the in game menu
      void resumeGame()
      Resumes the game
      void saveGame()
      Saves the game
      void setGameOver()
      Sets Game Over state and shows the Game Over menu
      void startNewGame()
      Starts a new game
